mapper.select: select count (*) from board where type = #{type} and title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

select b.boardnum , b.id , b.title , b.content , to_char(b.inputdate, 'mm-dd') inputdate , b.hits , (select count(*) from reply r where r.boardnum = b.boardnum) totalreply from board b where b.type = #{type} and b.title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' order by 1 desc
select boardnum , id , title , content , to_char(inputdate, 'mm-dd') inputdate , hits , originalfile , savedfile from board where boardnum = #{boardunm}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (replynum, boardnum, id, text) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{boardnum}, #{id}, #{text})
mapper.delete: delete from reply where boardnum = #{boardnum} and replynum = #{replynum}
mapper.update: update reply set text = #{text} where replynum = #{replynum}
mapper.select: select secretpassword from board where boardnum = #{boardnum}
